title: People promote culture of Jino ethnic group in Yunnan
content: People visit a market at a tourist attraction that promotes the culture of the Jino ethnic group, in Xishuangbanna, southwest China's Yunnan Province, on Aug. 13, 2020. Jino was the last of the 56 ethnic groups officially recognized by the Chinese government in 1979. (Xinhua/Chen Xinbo)
